name: AVCompositionTrackSegment
desc: A track segment that maps a time from the source media track to the composition track.

items.name: init(timeRange: CMTimeRange)
items.desc: Creates an object that presents an empty composition track segment.

items.name: init(url: URL, trackID: CMPersistentTrackID, sourceTimeRange: CMTimeRange, targetTimeRange: CMTimeRange)
items.desc: Creates an object that presents a segment of a media file that the specified URL references.

items.name: var sourceURL: URL?
items.desc: A URL of the container file whose media this track segment presents.

items.name: var sourceTrackID: CMPersistentTrackID
items.desc: An identifier of a track in the container file whose media this track segment presents.

items.name: var isEmpty: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the segment is empty.
